entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
